subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: During an interlude to a cold, rain-delayed game at Yankee Stadium, Manager Joe Girardi lit a fire under his chilled players, but it was not enough to prevent a Red Sox victory.
snippet: During an interlude to a cold, rain-delayed game at Yankee Stadium, Manager Joe Girardi lit a fire under his chilled players, but it was not enough to prevent a Red Sox victory.
